newsitem.title: USA: NYCE cotton futures close slightly off, rangebound.
newsitem.headline: NYCE cotton futures close slightly off, rangebound.

text.p: NYCE cotton futures ended barely budged from the previous close, having falling through nearby support early and then climbing just under unchanged by the close.

The contract slipped under 75.30 cents but managed to hold above the next level of support at 74.80 cents. The selling dried up late in the session, allowing the March contract to climb towards unchanged.
March cotton ended just 0.01 cent weaker at 75.53 cents per pound, traded 75.74 to 74.92 cents. The back months closed 0.13 higher to 0.50 lower.
Volume was moderate at an estimated 8,500 lots.
